text: Wilfrido Lucero Bolaños (28 December 1935 - 1 February 2022) was an Ecuadorian lawyer and politician. He was the Mayor of Tulcán from 1967 until 1970. He was also the Prefect of Carchi from 1970 until 1974. He was a member of the National Congress from 1979 until 1990 and again from 1998 until 2007. He was also the Congress's President from 1988 until 1990 and again from 2005 until 2007. Lucero was born in Tulcán Lucero died on 1 February 2022 in Tulcán, aged 86.El expresidente del Congreso, Wilfrido Lucero, falleció ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ecuadorian lawyers Category:Presidents of the National Congress of Ecuador
title: Wilfrido Lucero
